DOC.brief_summary: In first part study two new outcome measurement ( force reproducibility subacromial space ) test reproducibility . Therefore 30 healthy people assess . In second part study 60 patient randomly allocate two group . Group A ( n=30 ) perform traditional training program group B ( n=30 ) perform eccentric training program . Before onset training program , pain , function , maximal force , range motion , subacromial space force reproducibility assess . Both train program accomplish home . The first six week appointment therapist week explain , correct necessary , aggravate exercise . The next six week appointment diminish every two week . After 6 12 week train patient reassessed parameter .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Study Eccentric Training Program Stretching Patients With Chronical Rotator Cuff Tendinopathy
DOC.criteria: global tendon thin inhomogeneous echo partition calcification insertion symptom present least 3 month : painful resist isometric abduction , painful palpation supraspinatus tendon , impingement test positive document full thickness rotator cuff rupture lesion CRCT moment study echographic criterion rupture ( focal thinning , fluidfilled gap , compressibility )
